headerDisplay: homebridge-blinds-cmd provides a window covering (or blind) accessory to HomeKit, providing control and status functions through the command line scripts.
footerDisplay: For additional help and documentation please see the [developer page](https://github.com/hjdhjd/homebridge-blinds-cmd).

name.title: Blind Name
name.description: Name you want to give this blind accessory in HomeKit. Default: Blinds.

up.title: Up Command Script
up.description: Path to the command or script to raise the blind. Default: none.

down.title: Down Command Script
down.description: Path to the command or script to lower the blind. Default: none.

status.title: Status Command Script
status.description: Path to the command or script to show the current position of the blind. Default: none.

delay.title: Simulated Delay Duration
delay.description: Duration, in seconds, of an open or close event used to simulate action progress in HomeKit. Default: 0 (disabled).

refresh.title: Status Refresh Interval
refresh.description: Interval, in seconds, to execute the status command or script in order to keep HomeKit up to date on blinds status. Default: 0 (disabled).

manufacturer.title: Blind Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Manufacturer name to assign to this blind.

model.title: Blind Model
model.description: Model name to assign to this blind.
